headline: GTA Online
subtitle: With Friends Like These
content:
In Arena War, the only prize for coming second is a tank full of burning gasoline to the face.

But once you’re out of the match, it’s time to pull up a stool in the greatest spectator lounge ever devised: get a drink, bust out your Snapmatic for some action-selfies, or just start screwing with whoever knocked you out by playing Arena War Wheel, the only form of roulette that has “take control of a weaponized drone” as a possible outcome.
